#summary 互动信件

= 互动信件 =
<p>
	 </p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	从FreeCMS 1.2 开始支持</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	Admin和站点管理员可以管理站点下所有网上调查，普通用户只可管理自己添加的网上调查。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	1. 网上调查管理</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	从左侧管理菜单点击网上调查进入。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165610_6LGF_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165610_6LGF_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	2. 添加网上调查</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	在网上调查列表下方点击"添加"按钮。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165623_5f4V_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165623_5f4V_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	填写相关属性后点击"确定"按钮即可。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	提示：可以设置网上调查的选项选择类型，单选和多选。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	3. 编辑网上调查</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	选择需要编辑的网上调查，然后点击"编辑"按钮。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	注意:同时只能编辑一个网上调查。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165640_VIaY_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165640_VIaY_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165653_1Tj1_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165653_1Tj1_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	填写相关属性后点击"确定"按钮即可。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	4. 设置选项</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	选择需要设置选项的网上调查，然后点击"设置选项"按钮。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	注意:同时只对编辑一个网上调查。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165706_gGwQ_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165706_gGwQ_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	a. 添加选项</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165718_dVrZ_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165718_dVrZ_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	输入相关属性后点击"添加"按钮即可。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	b. 编辑选项</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165729_fEP1_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165729_fEP1_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	输入相关属性后点击"编辑"按钮即可。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	c. 删除选项</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165740_2BYH_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165740_2BYH_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	直接点击选项后面的"删除"按钮即可。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	5. 删除网上调查</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	选择需要删除的网上调查，然后点击"删除"按钮。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	提示:同时可以删除多个网上调查。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165753_ooOp_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165753_ooOp_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165803_hkLI_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/165803_hkLI_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
